text:
Installed openssl 1.0.2h under /web/apache/openssl/1.0.2h and version is verified. 

When running configure command for apache 2.2.31, it errors out with below message.

configure : error, SSL/TLS libraries were missing or unusable

env LDFLAGS="-ldl" ./configure --prefix=/web/apache/2.2.31 --enable-ssl --with-ssl=/web/apache/openssl/1.0.2h
creator: rckolli@hotmail.com
toscano.luca@gmail.com
text:
Hi! httpd 2.2.x is not supported anymore, plus this seems to be a question for the users@ mailing list rather than a bug.

Thanks!
